DOC.brief_title: Tympanostomy Tube Placement Children Office ( Inova Study )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Scheduled undergo tympanostomy tube insertion 2 . At least 6 month old young 22 year old 3 . Behavioral capacity cooperative temperament undergo awake procedure ( base physician judgement ) 4 . No history sensitivity reaction anesthesia choose procedure 1 . Pregnant lactating female 2 . Significantly atrophic , bimeric , completely atelectatic tympanic membrane 3 . Otitis externa 4 . Lacerations abrasion external auditory canal damage denude skin auditory canal 5 . Cerumen impaction result significant amount cleaning require visualize tympanic membrane 6 . Electrically sensitive subject subject electrically sensitive support system ( pacemaker , defibrillator , etc . ) 7 . Anatomy preclude sufficient visualization access tympanic membrane 8 . Anatomy necessitate tympanostomy tube placement posterior half tympanic membrane
